box_one.name: Juan Sebastian Suarez Ramirez
box_one.short_desc: I build innovative solutions that combine technology, creativity, and performance.

how_can_i_help_you.description_2: mindset is more than a mantra — it's the engine that powers every project. It transforms complex challenges into elegant, resilient, and high-performing solutions.

1.title: Intelligent AI & Automation
1.description: I build custom AI agents and intelligent systems that automate complex processes, providing deep insights and driving efficiency for your business.

2.description: Leveraging modern frameworks like Next.js and React, I create fast, scalable, and robust web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.

self_brand.title: NeGiUpp
self_brand.description: If you can imagine it, you can program it. Just never stop trying and, under no circumstances, give up!

sect_1.title: A Commitment to Growth
sect_1.description: NeGiupp is far more than a mere personal brand; it's a profound and unwavering commitment to growth and overcoming challenges. It embodies the 'Never Give Up' philosophy that has been the driving force behind every trial and achievement in my personal and professional journey.

list.1: Throughout my life, I've encountered a series of challenges that have propelled me to discover new strengths and consistently strive for the best version of myself. Each obstacle has transformed into an opportunity for personal evolution and the development of greater resilience.
list.2: NeGiupp encapsulates the attitude of never giving up, of persisting even when circumstances are daunting. It reflects my unwavering determination to surmount barriers and achieve goals that once appeared unattainable. Through this approach, I've been able to learn, grow, and evolve across all facets of my life.
list.3: In my professional trajectory and personal development, NeGiupp has become a guiding beacon towards continuous achievement and self-improvement. It serves as a constant reminder that difficulties are disguised opportunities and that resilience is the key to turning them into triumphs.
list.4: NeGiupp is a living testament to my belief that perseverance and the 'never give up' mindset pave the way for ongoing progress. Through this philosophy, I've unearthed the inner strength to confront any challenge and turn it into a stepping stone towards advancement on my journey towards growth and success.

recommender-ai-agent-for-ecommece.title: AI Recommender Agent for E-Commerce
recommender-ai-agent-for-ecommece.description: PandorAI's intelligent recommendation system. Deep personalization, semantic search, and automation ready to scale your store.

inside.description: E-commerce platform with personalized recommendation system, automatic order processing, and customer support with intelligent agents.

rol.title: My Role
rol.description: Fullstack Developer and CEO of PandorAI, leading the implementation of advanced AI to enhance customer experience and optimize operations.

algorithm_sect.title: Smart recommendations with vector search
algorithm_sect.description: Our system converts your queries into vectors using language models (embeddings) and performs semantic search on a vectorized product database. Finds matches by meaning, not just keywords.

list.1: User query transformed into semantic vectors
list.2: Intelligent search in a vectorized product database
list.3: Accurate, relevant, and personalized results in real time

how_it_works.title: How does the AI recommendation system work?

1_sec.title: User makes a query
1_sec.description: The system receives a customer's question, such as: 'What product do you recommend for sensitive skin?'.

2_sec.title: The agent analyzes the profile and responds
2_sec.description: The AI processes the conversation, history, and customer preferences, and recommends specific products in real time.

cta_finish.description: I’m available for new opportunities, collaborations, or to help boost your business with AI.

barber_shop.description: It is a web application where users can explore services, make reservations, and check barber shop information.

sec_2.description: It is a web application where users can explore services, make reservations, and check barber shop information. It also has an admin panel to manage appointments and clients.

sec_5.description: I was responsible for the complete development of the application: from the frontend with React/Next.js to the backend with Express and MongoDB. I implemented authentication, reservation validation, business logic, and responsive design.

sec_6.description: I am open to new opportunities as a Full Stack Developer.

sec_2.title: What
sec_2.description: A modern task management app that uses AI to help you organize your day. You can generate tasks with AI, automatically sort priorities, and receive smart suggestions.

list.5: Edit and manage with drag & drop

sec_5.description: * Public demo. It may take a few seconds to load.

ai_rox_pro.title: AI Rox Pro
ai_rox_pro.description: Hyrox training planner that adapts 4-week blocks with AI based on athlete feedback.

sect_1.title: Hyrox Training
sect_1.description: Automates the creation of 4-week training blocks. We use AI to analyze your performance and generate progressive routines based on overload principles.

sect_2.title: Why is it different?
sect_2.description: Everything you need for a planned, progressive, and safe training program, generated automatically.

1.title: Automatic feedback analysis
1.description: The app analyzes your comments after each session. Was an exercise too easy, too hard, or caused discomfort? Our AI system reads your feedback to intelligently adjust your next plan.

2.title: Structured 4-week blocks
2.description: Your training is organized in 4-week mesocycles. This proven structure ensures steady progress and helps you focus on clear goals each month, avoiding plateaus.

3.title: Scheduled deload weeks
3.description: To prevent overtraining, the fourth week of each block is a deload. The system reduces intensity to ensure recovery and help you come back stronger.

4.title: Adaptive load progression
4.description: Based on your feedback, the system adjusts weights, reps, or rest times. If an exercise was easy, the load will increase; if it was tough, your strength will be safely consolidated.

5.title: Safe alternatives for injuries
5.description: If you feel pain with an exercise, just report it. The AI will replace it with a safer alternative in your next block, allowing you to train without interruptions.

6.title: All in ready-to-use JSON format
6.description: Each plan is generated in a clean JSON format. This ensures your plan loads into the app quickly and reliably, with no display errors.

sect_3.title: Track Your Progress
sect_3.description: A clean and clear interface so you can focus on what really matters: training.

sec_4.title: Ready to stop planning and start training?
sec_4.description: Get your first smart training block and take your Hyrox preparation to the next level.

content.introduction: AI agents are revolutionizing e-commerce by transforming how businesses interact with customers and optimize operations. We offer advanced solutions that drive personalization, automation, and predictive analytics to help companies stand out in a competitive market.

one.title: Personalized Recommendations
one.description: AI-powered recommendation algorithms suggest products based on customer behavior and preferences, enhancing the shopping experience.

two.title: Virtual Customer Support Assistants
two.description: Conversational bots that provide 24/7 support, answering queries, providing order information, and reducing wait times.

three.title: Smart Inventory Management
three.description: Predictive agents anticipate product demand, helping reduce overstock or stockouts and optimizing the supply chain.

four.title: Dynamic Price Optimization
four.description: Automated price adjustments based on competitor data, demand, and market trends to maximize profits.

list.one: Increased conversions through personalized shopping experiences that influence customer decisions.
list.two: Improved customer satisfaction through fast, accurate, and always-available responses.
list.three: Reduced operational costs by automating repetitive tasks and support processes.
list.four: Improved accuracy in inventory and sales forecasting for better strategic decision-making.

development.title: Development
development.description: I create advanced AI agents using natural language processing, machine learning, and modern techniques to automate tasks and improve processes.

one.title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
one.description: Combines language generation models with real-time information retrieval from external sources to provide up-to-date and accurate answers.

two.title: Tool and Multi-Tool Systems
two.description: Agents can integrate with various tools (like search engines, calculators, and specialized APIs) to handle complex tasks efficiently. They can select tools based on the context of the query.

three.title: Multi-Agent Systems
three.description: Designs architectures where multiple AI agents collaborate to solve large or distributed problems, communicating and coordinating tasks for optimal decision-making.

key_features.title: Key Features
key_features.two: Reasoning and acting using up-to-date knowledge.
key_features.three: Scalability to handle simple to highly complex tasks.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.description: Implementing AI agents offers numerous advantages that transform business processes, improve operational efficiency, and personalize the customer experience.

one.title: Cost Reduction
one.description: Automates repetitive tasks, minimizes human errors, and reduces manual resource needs, optimizing operational budgets.

two.title: Improved Operational Efficiency
two.description: AI agents speed up key processes, enable real-time data-driven decisions, and improve overall workflow.

three.title: Real-Time Personalization
three.description: Delivers recommendations, responses, and solutions tailored to user behavior and preferences to enhance customer experience.

four.title: Scalability
four.description: Handles increasing data and request volumes without compromising performance or service quality.

five.title: Better Decision-Making
five.description: Uses predictive analytics and machine learning to forecast trends, assess risks, and make more informed decisions.

web_development.title: Fullstack Web Development
web_development.description: I provide fullstack web development services using modern technologies and agile practices. I specialize in building robust, scalable, and customized applications that enhance business efficiency, focusing on performance, user experience, and security.

metodologies.title: Agile Methodologies & CI/CD
metodologies.descrition: I apply agile methodologies to work iteratively, improve communication, and deliver results quickly. I also implement CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) to automate processes, ensure code quality, and perform safe and frequent deployments.

ux-ui.title: UX/UI Design
ux-ui.description: I offer user-centered design solutions that combine aesthetics, functionality, and usability to create memorable and effective experiences.

one.title: Responsive Design
one.description: Adaptive design that ensures an optimal experience across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.

two.title: Attractive Visual Interface
two.description: Creation of modern and elegant visual interfaces that enhance perception and user experience.

three.title: Prototypes and Wireframes
three.description: Design of wireframes and interactive prototypes to test and validate ideas before final implementation.

four.title: User-Centered Design
four.description: Design methodologies focused on user needs to create intuitive solutions aligned with their goals.

five.title: Cross-Platform Experience
five.description: Consistent design across different platforms to ensure a seamless and uniform user experience.

six.title: Enhanced Accessibility
six.description: Application of accessibility standards to ensure all users can interact with your products.

blog.sub_title: Explore articles on full-stack development, artificial intelligence, and tips to boost your tech career.

chtabot.toast_message_2: Remember, we’re here to help you with anything you need. 🚀
chtabot.toast_message_3: We’re always here for any questions or recommendations. 😊

profile-detail.how_can_i_hep_desc: I am a specialist in personalized recommendations for sports products. I help clients find the ideal products based on their fitness goals and needs, offering tailored suggestions and professional advice.

alert_clean_chat.title: Are you sure you want to clear the chat?

info_agent_2.name: Juan
info_agent_2.description: Juan is a customer service agent specializing in customer support and information management.

profile.greeting: Let me tell you something that has always driven me as a developer!
profile.shortIntro: Behind every line of code I write, there’s a story: a business looking to grow, someone trying to solve a problem, or an idea worth bringing to life.

makaia.roldescription: Engaged as a Frontend Developer in a dynamic bootcamp, tackling real-world tech challenges. Crafted innovative digital solutions using React.js and TypeScript, while implementing CSS preprocessors for enhanced styling. Applied Agile methodologies and CI/CD practices for efficient project execution. Excited to leverage this experience and skill set in future opportunities.

talent.roldescription: As a JavaScript Developer, I designed and executed sophisticated web scraping scripts, ensuring data quality and optimizing storage methodologies. Leveraged collaborative teamwork and advanced technologies, ultimately achieving a prominent position within my role. Excited to bring this expertise and success to new challenges.

negiupp.position: Freelancer FullStack Developer specializing in React.js and Node.js
negiupp.roldescription: As a fullstack developer I have developed amazing projects solving everyday problems through digital products with a powerful stack of technologies, among which React.js, Node.js, Next.js, JavaScript, Express.js, MongoDB, SQL, NoSQL stand out. You can visit the projects section in my website to learn more.

pandorai.roldescription: As the CEO and co-founder of PandorAI, I led the creation of a clear vision, the formation of a talented team, and the structuring of our services. Drawing on my experience as a fullstack developer, we implemented the RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technique, which significantly reduced the operational costs of language models. This approach not only improved our offering to clients but also increased the company's profits, aligning technological innovation with business efficiency to democratize access to advanced artificial intelligence solutions.

frontend.certificationName: Frontend Developer With enfasis In React.js and desing thinkg tools
